aboutMe.title: A bit of my story
description: Actually, my name is {name}. I'm {age} years old. I come from a small town 60 km from Cracow. From an early age, I have been interested in computer science and in 2021 I started studying applied computer science at the Collage of Economics and Computer Science in Cracow. Every day I enrich myself with new skills, so I can do more and more.

I am currently working as a Frontend Developer. In my free time I am involved in creating music as well as performing it. I enjoy hanging out with friends, playing instruments such as guitar and piano. In general, I can't imagine the world without music.
timeline: 2021 jul - First job as Frontend developer at Maal company
2021 oct - Starting studies at the Collage of Economics and Computer Science in Cracow
2023 feb - New job at Ideo company
2023 oct - GoIT Mentor - Share knowledge, inspire the future
